SEARCH

Uses of Annotation Interface
org.annotation.UI

Packages that use UI
Package
Description
org.ui
Main package that contains Main file and two sub-packages
org.ui.swing
Package that has all files required for proper working of Swing version of Quiz
Note that these are only UI files
org.ui.swing.admin
Package that has files required to maintain DB
Also, it has sub-package that contains files accessible through AdminOthers
org.ui.swing.admin.other.details
Package that have file Details which is responsible for allowing user to change password or/and login
org.ui.swing.admin.other.table
Package that have files AddTable ChangeTable DeleteTable TablesChange which are responsible for allowing user to manage tables in DB
org.ui.swing.admin.other.tutorial
Package that contains file AdminTutorial which is UI for showing admin the how-to in managing this program
org.ui.swing.exceptions
 
org.ui.swing.other
Package that is able to show to user less important things such as credits info
org.ui.swing.questions
Package that contains question's UI
org.ui.swing.score
Package that has files responsible for: Showing user if his answer was correct or not Showing him his final score
org.ui.swing.tutorial
Package that has file responsible for showing user how-to

  • Uses of UI in org.ui.swing.score

    Classes in org.ui.swing.score with annotations of type UI
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Correct
    Class that is responsible for letting user know that his answer was correct
    class 
    FinalScore
    Class that is responsible for delaying act of showing user his score to prevent from
    to early initialisation of actual score which may not be right
    class 
    Incorrect
    Class that is responsible for letting user know that his answer was incorrect
    It also shows what answer was expected
    class 
    ShowScore
    Class that is responsible for showing final score to the user
